steps.title: It's Journal Time: We are not monitoring your response in real time. If you need help, contact a doctor or mental health care provider. Resources are available on the study website https://staging.wtgmhdc.synapse.org/contact.
Here is your topic. When you have a bad day, what things do you do to make it better?
steps.placeholderText: To protect your privacy, please do not include your name or any information that could be used to identify you.
